components.html:
To serve a Notice of Constitutional Question (and supporting documents) on the Attorney General of British Columbia, please fill out the form below. Once submitted, an email acknowledging receipt will be sent to the "contact email" within 1 business day. 

If you do not receive an email confirming receipt within 1 business day, please contact aglsblitigationect@gov.bc.ca. For clarity, service is not effected until an email acknowledgement has been provided.
components.label: Content
HTML
components.content:
Note
This portal is currently only available to serve Notices of Constitutional Question and supporting documents.
For more methods of service for other documents, please see Serving Legal Documents on the Attorney General of British Columbia .

Technical Issues
